name: The Plagued Castle
description:
Prologue: "The King is dead, the castle has been overrun by a dark plague. It is your destiny, to cleanse the castle..."

This game takes you on cinematic 2D side scrolling adventure.  Collect shards from the fallen King's sword, free the souls of corrupted knights, and destroy the heart of the plague!

It is important to note: I made this game to tell story, not to create some awe inspiring mechanics to blow your mind!

This game was made is less than two weeks for the JamCraft2 game jam.
